animeTitle: Running Boy: Star Soldier no Himitsu
animeDescription: This anime was made by Hudson Soft, which created the "Star Soldier" game. Its designer, Yoichi Takahashi, appeared in a cameo and sang the theme songs.  By coincidence, the film was released the same day as "Super Mario Brothers," also based on a video game.  The film was a box-office failure in Japan.  (Source: bcdb.com/)
animeStaff: [['Yamakawa Norio', ['Producer']], ['Yamamoto Mataichirou', ['Producer']], ['Matsuura Noriyoshi', ['Sound Director']], ['Oka Kasumi', ['Theme Song Lyrics', 'Screenplay']]]
